SEARCH
Package com.pablovilan.usermanagement.model.services

Interface UserService

public interface UserService
Service interface for managing users in the system. This interface defines methods for creating, deleting, finding, and updating users, as well as checking user existence by username and email.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    createUser(String username, String password)
    Creates a new user with the specified username and password.
    boolean

    Deletes a user by their username.

    Checks if a user exists by their email.

  • Method Details

    • createUser

      boolean createUser(String username, String password)
      Creates a new user with the specified username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the new user
      password - the password of the new user
      Returns:
      true if the user was created successfully, false otherwise

    • deleteUser

      boolean deleteUser(String username)
      Deletes a user by their username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user to delete
      Returns:
      true if the user was deleted successfully, false otherwise

    • findUserByUsername

      User findUserByUsername(String username)
      Finds a user by their username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user to find
      Returns:
      the User object if found, or null if not found

    • updatePassword

      boolean updatePassword(String username, String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      Updates the password of an existing user.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user to update
      oldPassword - the current password of the user
      newPassword - the new password for the user
      Returns:
      true if the password was updated successfully, false otherwise

    • updateUser

      User updateUser(String username, String newUsername, String newPassword, String newEmail)
      Updates the profile of an existing user.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user to update
      newUsername - the new username for the user
      newPassword - the new password for the user
      newEmail - the new email for the user
      Returns:
      the updated User object if the update is successful, or null if the user does not exist

    • findAllUsers

      List<User> findAllUsers()
      Retrieves all users in the system.
      Returns:
      a list of all User objects

    • existsByUsername

      boolean existsByUsername(String username)
      Checks if a user exists by their username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to check
      Returns:
      true if the user exists, false otherwise

    • existsByEmail

      boolean existsByEmail(String email)
      Checks if a user exists by their email.
      Parameters:
      email - the email to check
      Returns:
      true if the user exists, false otherwise
